description.english: Strike a Roman in midair with Asterix under the effect of the magic potion when Obelix tosses a Roman

description.english: Sling yourself using rubber bands 20 times in less than 30 seconds
description.german: Schleudere dich selbst mit Gummibändern 20 Mal in unter 30 Sekunden

description.italian: Catapultati usando gli elastici 20 volte nel giro di 30 secondi
description.spanish: Lánzate con gomas elásticas 20 veces en menos de 30 segundos
